aboutus.title: About Us
aboutus.subtitle2: Your window to the world of Retail
aboutus.content:
IndiaRetailing.com—the home page of the Indian retail industry—is an initiative of IMAGES Group, a retail intelligence organisation that is trusted globally as the catalyst for profitable growth of modern Indian retail through knowledge platform leadership. Headquartered in New Delhi, IMAGES Group is South Asia and the Middle East’s leading retail intelligence organisation which empowers businesses with actionable insights and fosters growth & innovation in the retail industry through its diverse portfolio of B2B magazines, conferences, exhibitions, research reports, and web portals.

As IMAGES Group’s flagship website, IndiaRetailing.com is uniquely placed as a retail knowledge platform which provides suppliers, investors, and retailers with critical insights to create a competitive advantage.

Founded in 2006, IndiaRetailing.com provides unrivalled news, insights, intelligence, analysis, and data covering retail operations across most Indian markets and is frequented by India’s leading brands, retailers, manufacturers, suppliers, consultants and retail management students for knowledge, insights, and news which help drive growth and diversify into new sectors and markets.

Beside a wealth of information, IndiaRetailing.com boasts an exclusive database of retail brands and retailers, retail investors and consultants, retail real estate developers, retail technology and system firms, finance outfits, store design, and shop-fit professionals.

aboutus.title: Our Vision & Mission
aboutus.content: To be trusted as the catalyst for profitable growth of modern retail, through knowledge platform leadership and to profitably connect our consumers to businesses, people, knowledge and ideas associated with modern retail.

title: Images Publications
subtitle: IMAGES Group’s strong portfolio of B2B publications have served since 1992 to inform, advise, and inspire industry leaders and decision makers.
subtitle1: IMAGES Awards are respected for the unbiased assessment and recognition of retail performance, while other initiatives in Business Intelligence, Real Estate & Market Research, Retail Training and On-line Community Building play important roles in further developing the world’s most attractive retail destination – India.
subtitle2: IMAGES Business Exhibitions and Knowledge Forums & Conferences are unique platforms which serve to connect businesses, people, knowledge, and ideas associated with modern retail.
